RumorFact.Text: The Inspired's construction required all available gravity crystals, and a white hole warp core obtained from the Deep Storm Station's paired warp cores.
The ghost matter collected by the Inspired was warped into the Deep Storm Station for containment.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a frozen comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.

AltText.Text: An artificial comet made of gravity crystals hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.

ExploreFact.Text: The Inspired was a superweapon made to bring massive destruction to the source of ghost matter.

AltText.Text: The Inspired was a superweapon made to bring massive destruction to the source of the Interloper.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a mural detailing the construction of something called the Inspired.
After realizing the Hearthians were on the verge of extinction, a Nomai named Cassava decided to exchange the Inspired's warp core before launching it towards Timber Hearth.
The ghost matter collected by the Inspired was warped into the Deep Storm Station for containment, and kept in stationary orbit around Giant's Deep in case this containment was breached.
